nodes.name: version

devdoc.details: This proxy holds the storage contract and delegates every call to the current implementation set. Besides, it allows to upgrade the token's behaviour towards further implementations, and provides authorization control functionalities

implementation().details: Tells the address of the current implementation

isOwner().return: true if `msg.sender` is the owner of the contract.

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

upgradeTo(address).details: Allows ProxyStorage contract to upgrade the current implementation.

params.newImplementation: representing the address of the new implementation to be set.

version().details: Tells the version number of the current implementation
version().return: uint representing the number of the current version

devdoc.title: EternalStorageProxy

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.
